---
title: "Multivariate Analysis of Variance (MANOVA) - 19BCE1460"
output:
  pdf_document: default
  html_document: default
---
```{r}
library(dplyr)
require("datasets")
penguinsdata <- read.csv("S:/WIN SEM 21-22/Data Visualization/Lab/penguins_lter.csv")
penguinsdata <- na.omit(penguinsdata)
str(penguinsdata)
set.seed(1234)
dplyr::sample_n(penguinsdata, 10)
cul <- penguinsdata$CulmenLengthmm
fli <- penguinsdata$FlipperLengthmm
# MANOVA test
res.man <- manova(cbind(CulmenLengthmm, FlipperLengthmm) ~ Island, data = penguinsdata)
summary(res.man)
summary.aov(res.man)

```
